The text is mainly talking about ………
questionsData.article: The black stork is a beautiful bird with long straight legs, sharp red beaks, large wings and shining necks. These birds are widespread, however, spotting them on populated lands might be difficult as they are very (shy 1). Their diet includes fish and other amphibians. They are tall creatures that usually live near rivers and lakes. They are also found to make nests on mountains and hills near good water sources. They prefer staying away from humans. They live either alone or either in pairs, avoiding contact with humans. They live up to 18 years on their own in the wild. However, there are records of these birds living up to 36 years. The black stork, Ciconia nigra, is the loudest stork family, even louder than the white stork. However, they are quieter than other birds in general. Baby storks are called chicks or hatchlings. The food given to chicks is first eaten by the parents themselves, and then (thrown 2) in (their 3) mouths.
